product_name: prAna Freemont Pants - Men's 32" Inseam - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Whether your day includes a trip to the climbing gym or a casual stroll around town, the prAna Freemont pants with 32 in. inseam can handle it all, delivering comfort, mobility and good looks. Textured Bedford cord cotton fabric is highly breathable and very soft for excellent comfort. Zip fly with button closure; gusseted inseam; reinforced hand pocket entries. Closeout.
short_description: Whether your day includes a trip to the climbing gym or a casual stroll around town, the prAna Freemont pants with 32 in. inseam can handle it all, delivering comfort, mobility and good looks.
